Christopher Otule (amụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 4, 1990) bụ onye Amerika-Naijiria ọkachamara egwuregwu na BCM Gravelines nke LNB Pro A
Ọ gbara basketball kọleji na Mahadum Marquette
Otule gbara basket bọọlụ afọ isii na Marquette, anọ dị ka onye mbido egwuregwu mmeghe
Chris gara undrafted na  NBA draft nke afọ 2014 ma mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara n'ihu na-egwu egwu na mba ofesi, malite na Germany.
